title: Boxes...boxes...boxes
creator_credit: Coincidence Productions, Robin Dove and Sue Wilson
brief_description: Shows a highschool “art event” at Hyde Park, Sydney. Includes the human sandwich, capturing space in boxes, man’s ordered existence, a 50 foot long piece of weaving, and seeing the environment from a new viewpoint.
creator_credit_for_label: Coincidence Productions, Robin Dove and Sue Wilson
